subject: Missing item
description_text:
Hi I placed an order for the haptic motors and gear shifter and have only
received the haptic motors. The 6+r shifter is missing?

conversations.body_text: Hi joshua williams,    I see that both of your packages have been delivered. Did you receive the second one?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047023889486,SF6047023889510

No I've not received the one item the vam pro haptic motors I need this
solving as they are Christmas presents and expensive ones

On Fri, 14 Nov 2025, 2:58 am support@simsonn.com,
Hi joshua williams,    The package has been delivered. Please check your front door first and ask your family members and neighbors. Thank you for your cooperation.

Yeah your right I found it. I was unaware of there been multiple delivery
companies been used but thank you for the reply and help. Am thinking the
handbrake will be the next buy loving the equipment so far

On Fri, 14 Nov 2025, 8:44 am support@simsonn.com,
Hi joshua williams,    Thank you for your prompt reply. Have fun!
